id: Novak Djokovic completes 'mission impossible' in mastering John Isner serve
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Danielle Rossingh, for CNNUpdated 0926 GMT (1726 HKT) November 13, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.London, UK (CNN)After a shock loss by Roger Federer on Sunday, order was restored at the ATP World Tour Finals on Monday by Novak Djokovic.💪 @Cristiano in the house 😎#CR7 @juventusfc #NittoATPFinals pic.twitter.com/3UnnBIHDWS
